title: The Simpsons
short_plot_summary: The misadventures of the Simpson family living in the fictional town of Springfield as they navigate through life, work, and family.
explanation: A yellow heart, representing the unique yellow skin color of the Simpson characters
A family emoji, symbolizing the main characters, the Simpson family
A donut, Homer Simpson's favorite food and iconic snack
A couch, for the famous couch gag that appears in the show's opening sequence
A factory, representing the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant where Homer works
